page.title: 06Customs.
page.content: {May Day.} This custom started over a hundred years ago.On May 1st one of the local schoolgirls is chosen as the May Queen and the festival is a celebration of spring and includes traditional songs,speeches and the dancing around the Maypole. {Samson Picnic.} This is an annual visit to the uninhabited island of Samson by the local schoolchildren.It was started in 1949 by the then headmaster,Mr. Browse after a donation was left by the Macdonald Trust for a childrens' treat.Sports took place on the grass bank until storms destroyed the bank during the 1960's. {Gig Racing.}This has developed into a tourist attraction over ercent years although in the past these six_oared gigs did race to take pilots to ships going up the English Channel in the 18th century.
